THEME: Kolkata Life! 
 
RULES: 
 
1. There are two groups for this competition: 
 
(i) Black and White Variant 
 
(ii) Color Variant 
 
2. Each participant can submit at most 2 (two) photographs (soft copy) per group, in JPEG 
 
format, 10' by 15' in size, resolution 300 dpi. File size of a photograph should not exceed 5 Mb. 
 
Submit only formatted print ready photographs. 
 
3. A caption/write-up (not more than 50 words) must be attached with each photograph in .doc 
 
format, along with the submitter's name, collegeâ€™s name, year, email id, phone no., camera 
 
model, technical specifications, date and time. 
 
4. Watermarking is strictly not allowed. 
 
5. Participants are requested to mail their photographs to spectrum.avenir2015@gmail.com. 
 
The last date of submission is April 8th 2015 till 11:59AM 
 
6. The best entries from each group will be considered for final round of competition and will be 
 
displayed at Netaji Subhash Engineering College Premises on the 2nd day of Avenir 2015. 
 
7. The participants of the selected photographs will be notified through email. The registration 
 
fee for the selected photograph is Rs. 100/- each. 
 
8. Only duly registered photographs will be considered for the final judgment. 
 
9. The final judging and announcement of results will be done on Last Day of Avenir 2015 by 
 
our respected Judge, Mr. Debarshi Duttagupta. 
 
10. There would be only three winning photographs. 
 
11. The prizes will be distributed on Last Day of Avenir 2015. Timing will be informed via mail 
 
or by phone call. 
 
12. For any further queries, please e-mail us. 
 
Contact: Arghya Mondal [+91 72 7842 7531]
